message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $180. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me halfway?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to compromise at $160, which is a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $140, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at this price?
I can see you're serious about getting the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $155, which is still a good profit for me. What do you think?
I'm getting close to walking away, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $145, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John.
